column5: Hey all,  I'm in the market for a used van. I've got a good deal on a 2006 Honda Odyssey. It's has 95000k's and looks great. I spoke to a coworker that used to work for Honda and that all of the transmission issues have been fixed in the line and that it's a reliable van.  I've read the reviews on it, and like every other car out there, some love it, some don't.  Just wondering if anyone has had any experience with it.  Thanks  Dave
I have 140,000 miles on my 2002 and expect to add another 140,000 plus.  It's been great.  Transmission has been replaced and is strong.  It knows the way to Red Lake and back.
